thread.section_title: NorthShore Care Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NorthShore Care Supply | www.northshorecare.com
thread.title: Joseph
thread.title_full: NorthShore Care Supply reviewed by Joseph

author: Joseph
title: Joseph
text: I am impressed with the response to my order for incontinent supplies for my son. NorthShore had what I needed. They made sure to differentiate between their many similar offerings and let me purchase just the quantity I needed until we could get back home. Delivery was on schedule and I was pleased with the purchase.
